'''BullGuard Limited''', founded in [[2001]] by [[Morten Lund]] and Theis SÃ¸ndergaard, is an [[Internet security]] company. Headquartered in [[London]], [[United Kingdom|UK]], BullGuard has operations in more than six countries.

[[Image:BullGuard Internet Security 8.0.png|thumb|left|BullGuard Internet Security 8.0]]
The first version of BullGuard was released in June of 2002. By early 2003 more than 3 million users had installed BullGuard. By 2006 this had risen to more than 16 million downloads and the company had products for desktop PCs, mobiles and [[Peer-to-peer file sharing|P2P]] networking, such as [[Kazaa]].
The first version of BullGuard was released in June of 2002. By early 2003 more than 3 million users had installed BullGuard. By 2006 this had risen to more than 16 million downloads and the company had products for desktop PCs, mobiles and [[Peer-to-peer file sharing|P2P]] networking, such as [[Kazaa]].
